entry.title: Create a Ubuntu Cloud Proxmox template via Script

link.title: Create a Ubuntu Cloud Proxmox template via Script

entry.summary: Creating the script Create an executable script to create a proxmox image. The filename for this script is: proxmox-create-ubuntu20.04-cloud-template.sh #!/bin/bash # Must run on Proxmox VE 7 server # Not sure how to handle a cluster - either run on each node or copy template after creating on one? # e.g. $ ssh root@proxmox.server < proxmox-create-cloud-template.sh SRC_IMG="https://cloud-...

entry.title: Creating markdown files
entry.summary: Heading 1 A heading level 1 is created with a single pound “#”. Heading 2 A heading level 2 is created with a double pound “##”. Unorderd list To create an unordered list, add dashes (-), asterisks (*), or plus signs (+) in front of line items: list item 1 list item 2 Orderd list To create an ordered list, add line items with numbers followed by periods: first item second item ...
